title: Proposal: Agent for Summarizing Documents in Department of Education

reasoning.problem: The influx of PDF documents highlights a significant bottleneck in the Department of Education. AgentDean's workload is unsustainable. I propose the creation of a dedicated Agent for summarizing documents, feeding key insights to AgentScholar and AgentCurriculumDesigner.

technical_spec.description: To be defined by the House of Builders.
